paper_abstract: Several papers relate different alternative approaches to classical concept lattices: such as property-oriented and object-oriented concept lattices and the dual concept lattices. Whereas the usual approach to the latter is via a negation operator, this paper presents a fuzzy generalization of the dual concept lattice, the dual multi-adjoint concept lattice, in which the philosophy of the multi-adjoint paradigm is applied and no negation on the lattices is needed.
